quizzes.title: Advanced ML Algorithms Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of advanced machine learning algorithms and their implementations.

questionData.question: Which ensemble method combines multiple weak learners to create a strong learner?
questionData.explanation: All three methods (Bagging, Boosting, and Stacking) are ensemble techniques that combine weak learners.

quizzes.title: Deep Learning Architectures Quiz
quizzes.description: Evaluate your knowledge of various deep learning architectures and their applications.

questionData.question: What type of neural network is best suited for image processing?
questionData.explanation: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) are specifically designed for image processing tasks.

quizzes.title: Optimization Techniques Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of model optimization, hyperparameter tuning, and performance improvement.

questionData.question: What is the purpose of cross-validation?
questionData.explanation: Cross-validation serves multiple purposes including preventing overfitting, estimating performance, and helping with hyperparameter tuning.
